publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7193 Aileen Campbell: Clyde and Avon Valleys Landscape Partnership Project—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Clyde and Avon Valleys Landscape Partnership project; notes that the project will focus on conservation, improving orchards and woodlands, helping small businesses, local tourism and community events, creating routes for outdoor activities and raising awareness of the cultural and landscape heritage of the valleys, and applauds the Heritage Lottery Fund for awarding £2 million to the Clyde and Avon Valleys Landscape Partnership project.
S3M-7193 Clyde and Avon Valleys Landscape Partnership Project (lodged on 8 October 2010) Christina McKelvie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Angela Constance*
